ComicInfo.Title: Monsters Don't Make Campfires
ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC
JEFF LEMIRE and GABRIEL HERNÁNDEZ WALTA's hit series returns!
Birdie and Dom find themselves searching through an abandoned road-side circus when they discover hints of…life. Elsewhere, Agent Weaver enlists Deputy Donnie to help piece together the frantic clues they have amassed so far.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-27 02:33:36. [CVDB1029053] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 05:09:48. [Issue ID 2578026]
